name: CLARITY_BED_DAY
description: This table contains information about bed day type classification records, which are used in the Referrals and Case Management modules.

columns.name: BED_DAY_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the bed day type record.

columns.name: BED_DAY_TYPE_ID_BED_DAY_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the bed day type record (i.e. ICU or non-authorized.)

columns.name: BED_DAY_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the bed day type record (i.e. ICU or non-authorized.)
